content.rendered:
Alex Kissner

Recruiting Operations Manager

BS Business Administration and General Management: North Dakota State University

 

ADVICE:

Advice for Candidates:  Have confidence in your skills, and show that confidence in your interview with the hiring manager. 

Advice for Hiring Managers: Be clear on what skills are required to help us provide you with the quality of candidates you are looking for. 

 

HOBBIES AND INTERESTS:

I enjoy sports (all), fishing, and video games. 

 

 

INSPIRATIONAL QUOTE:

“When you want to succeed as bad as you want to breathe, then you’ll be successful.”- Eric Thomas
